content: _"Adaptability alone uncovers significance in subtlety. Once hidden inside the Buddha’s head, this treasure has a secret yet to be revealed."_

The content is as follows:
_"Adaptability alone uncovers significance in subtlety. Once hidden inside the Buddha’s head, this treasure has a secret yet to be revealed."_
